mapper.insert: insert into SEC_USER_INFO (INSTANCE_RRN, INSTANCE_ID, INSTANCE_DESC, USER_NAME, SPACE_DEFINITION, ACTIVE_VERSION, CURRENT_VERSION, ENTITY_STATUS, PASSWORD, PLAIN_PASSWORD, SALT, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, LAST_UPDATED_USER, LAST_UPDATED_TIME, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5) values (#{instanceRrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spaceDefinition.instanceRrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entityStatus.code,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plainPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdUser.instanceRrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastUpdatedUser.instanceRrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
